front.title: Resource ReserVation Protocol-Traffic Engineering (RSVP-TE) LSP Route Diversity using Exclude Routes

abstract.t: [RFC4874] specifies methods by which route exclusions may be communicated during RSVP-TE signaling in networks where precise explicit paths are not computed by the LSP ingress node. This document specifies signaling for additional route exclusions based on LSPs currently existing or expected to exist within the network.
